items.name: Fried Crab Roll
items.description: mixture of seasoned ground shrimp and crab meat. wrapped with tofu skin. served with plum sauce.

items.name: Steamed Thai Dumpling
items.description: mixture of ground shrimp & chicken, xicama and taro served w. ginger sauce.

items.name: Chicken Satay
items.description: sliced chicken breast marinated with thai herbs served on skewers with peanuts sauce and cucumber sauce.

items.name: Curry Puffs
items.description: puff pastry stuffed with ground chicken sauteed with potato, onion, thai herbs and seasoning served with cucumber sauce.

items.name: Shrimp Rolls
items.description: crispy rolls of shrimps served with plum sauce.

items.name: Web Rolls
items.description: deep fried seasoned shrimp and crab wrapped up with vermicelli net served plum sauce.

items.name: Fried Fish Cake
items.description: one of our favorite appetizer, fried ground fish and shrimp cake. this is a very mild spices dish served with sweet chili sauce and ground peanuts.

items.name: New Herbal Chicken Wings
items.description: marinated with herb like ginger, garlic, cilantro roots, turmeric, curry and baked in coconut milk. served with sweet chili sauce. (itÂ’s fingers lickin good!!!).

items.name: New Duck Wings
items.description: homestyle roasted duck wings served with sweet & spicy chili sauce.

items.name: Fried Fish Ball
items.description: served with house sauce.

items.name: Fried Calamari
items.description: served with sweet chili sauce.

items.name: Fried Vegetable Spring Rolls
items.description: thai crispy roll of seasoned vermicelli noodle, cabbage, taro and carrot served with plum sauce.

items.name: Steamed Vegetable Dumpling
items.description: thai style chive dumpling served with thai ginger sauce.

items.name: Fried Scallion Pancake
items.description: (thai style) thai style pancake served with our ginger sauce.

items.name: Fried Taro Pancake
items.description: if you love the scallion pancake you must try this one.

items.name: Fried Tofu
items.description: served with house sauce.

items.name: Edamame
items.description: (boiled soy bean with sea salt).

items.name: Combination Seafood
items.description: thai hot and sour soup with hot chili, lemongrass, mushroom, lime juice and thai herbs in shrimp broth.

items.name: Tom Kha Chicken Or Vegetable
items.description: thai traditional coconut milk broth with mushroom, lemongrass and lime juice.

items.name: Chicken Vegetable Soup
items.description: clear broth of chicken and mix vegetable will leave you feeling so good all day.

items.name: Hot And Sour Soup
items.description: mixed vegetables, tofu with thai chili and tabasco in a light brown soup.

items.name: Vegetable Ginger Soup
items.description: mixed vegetables and fresh ginger in our clear broth.

items.name: New Crab Stick Soup
items.description: mixed vegetable and vegetarian crab stick in our clear broth.

items.name: Thai Green Papaya Salad
items.description: (the best salad). shredded green papaya with garlic, tomato, string bean, peanut, thai little fresh chili marinated in fresh lime juice and thai seasoning.

items.name: Thai Salad
items.description: lettuce, cucumber, tomato, onion, bean sprout and boiled egg served with our famous peanut dressing.

items.name: Mango Salad And Avocado
items.description: (so yummy). present a mouth watering dish with fresh shredded mango, avocado, carrot and shallot soaked in lime juice and thai spices.

items.name: Grilled Shrimp Salad
items.description: grilled shrimps and mushroom with onion, shallot, scallion, lemongrass, kafir lime leaves soaked in chili paste, lime juice and thai spices.

items.name: Grilled Squid Salad
items.description: grilled squid, onion, shallot, scallion, lemongrass and kafir lime leaves soaked in chili paste, lime juice and thai spices.

items.name: New Yum Tilapia Fish
items.description: (new healthy). sliced steamed fish w. onion, shallots, scallion in lime sauce & thai sauce.

items.name: Grilled Beef Salad
items.description: grilled beef marinated in chili paste cutout, onion, tomato, cucumber and scallion soaked in lime juice and thai spices.

items.name: Yum Combination Seafood
items.description: (still love the dish). grilled shrimps, sea scallops, squid, new zealand mussels, mushroom, onion, shallot, scallion soaked in chili paste, lime juice and thai spices.

items.name: Yum Duck
items.description: crispy boneless duck, pineapple, shredded green apple, onion, roasted chili pepper and crushed peanut soaked in lime juice and thai spices.

items.name: Nam Tok Beef
items.description: (new!!! authentic spicy salad!) grilled steak marinated in chili paste with red onion, ground roasted rice and scallion soaked in lime juice and thai spice.

items.name: Yum Woon Sen
items.description: (new!!! glass noodle). shrimp squid ground chicken shallot scallion in lime sauce and chili (good try!).

categories.name: Fish
categories.description: Served with jasmine rice, price may vary according to the market price. We are using the red snapper for the best taste. May change according to availability.

items.name: Basil Sauce
items.description: thai famous spicy sauce with chili pepper, onion, kafir lime leaves and sweet chili paste.

items.name: Chili & Tamarind Sauce
items.description: (authentic way to serve fish). sweet and sour tamarind sauce with shallots, garlic and ground fresh chili.

items.name: Ginger Honey Sauce
items.description: (best sauce). freshly and earthy from fresh ginger, sweet pepper, onion, black mushroom, carrot and black bean sauce.

items.name: Sweet And Sour Sauce
items.description: refreshing flavor from tomato paste with fresh tomato, onion, cucumber, carrot, sweet pepper and scallion.

items.name: Garlic Sauce
items.description: roasted garlic and black pepper with mushroom and pea & carrot served with cucumber.

categories.name: Fillet Catfish
categories.description: We use small size of fresh catfish from the market each day. You will love its texture and flavor. Served with jasmine rice.

items.name: Sauteed Ginger
items.description: with black mushroom, onion, sweet pepper, carrot in black bean sauce.

items.name: Sauteed Crushed Black Pepper
items.description: with fresh mushroom, onion, string bean, chili pepper, lime leaves and lemongrass.

items.name: Sauteed Green Peppercorn
items.description: (most popular dish). with eggplant, string bean sweet pepper, mushroom, garlic, lime leaves, basil leaves and green peppercorn in sweet chili paste.

categories.name: Thai Curry
categories.description: Served with jasmine rice. Pick your choice of:

items.name: Red Curry
items.description: (very popular). spicy red curry paste mixed with coconut milk, bamboo shoot, sweet pepper, basil leaves and kafir lime leaves.

items.name: Green Curry
items.description: lightly sweet flavor but spicy of green curry paste mixed with coconut milk, bamboo shoot, sweet pepper, pea & carrot, basil leaves and lime leaves.

items.name: Panang Curry
items.description: lightly sweet and spicy of panang curry paste mixed with coconut milk, onion, shallot, string bean, carrot, sweet pepper, basil leaves and lime leaves.

items.name: Massaman Curry
items.description: (not spicy but flavorful). sweet and peanuty flavor of massaman curry paste mixed with coconut milk, potato, onion, peanut served with cucumber sauce.

items.name: Rama Curry
items.description: steamed mixed vegetable topped with thai peanut sauce and crushed peanut.

items.name: Wild Curry
items.description: (the most spicy). thai red curry broth, without using coconut milk, red curry flavor are at most strongest spice with eggplant, mushroom, bamboo shoot, carrot, sweet pepper, string bean, galangal root and thai spices. suggest to serve with lots of cold wa

categories.name: Yajai Work
categories.description: Served with jasmine rice. Pick your choice of:

items.name: Sauteed Ginger
items.description: (the energizer). refreshing flavor from fresh ginger with sweet pepper, onion, black mushroom, mushroom and carrot in our black bean sauce.

items.name: Sauteed Basil
items.description: (donÂ’t know what to eat, try this one). thai famous spicy sauce with mushroom, sweet pepper, onion & lime leaves.

items.name: Sauteed Cashew Nut
items.description: with lightly sweet and crunchy from cashew nuts with sweet pepper, carrot, celery, roasted chili pepper, scallion.

items.name: Sauteed Garlic Pepper
items.description: heavy garlic and cilantro flavor with mushroom, onion and pea & carrot.

items.name: Sauteed Sweet & Sour
items.description: (really good). refreshing flavor from tomato paste with fresh tomato, onion, pineapple cucumber, carrot,sweet pepper and scallion.

items.name: Sauteed String Bean
items.description: (the sweet chili paste still rock). a great combination of sweet chili paste and string bean with carrot, sweet pepper and kafir lime leaves.

items.name: Sauteed Broccoli
items.description: another great simple dish with carrot and sweet pepper in garlic sauce.

items.name: Sauteed Mixed Vegetable
items.description: (classic). a combination of our fresh cut vegetable in our garlic sauce.

items.name: Sauteed Eggplant
items.description: (all time favorite). throughout these years, this dish is still one of our famous items which you have to try. mushroom, onion, roasted chili pepper, carrot and basil leaves in sweet chili sauce.

items.name: Sauteed Bamboo Shoot
items.description: i hope this dish will be your new flavor of the day. the smooth sauteed of scallion, sweet pepper and mushroom in soy sauce flavor will keep you say hmm all day.

items.name: Sauteed Chili Paste
items.description: a great match of shrimps and squid sauteed with zuccini, mushroom, carrot, onion in our sweet chili sauce.

items.name: Yajai Grilled Chicken
items.description: (youÂ’ll love it). experience our thai style marinated chicken with herbs, garlic and seasoned so well that would leave you coming for more, served with salad & sweet chili sauce.

items.name: Fillet Tilapia And Mango Salad
items.description: crispy fillet tilapia served with mango salad, shredded mango, shallot and cashew nuts soaked in lime juice and thai spices.

items.name: Grilled Steak And Mango Salad
items.description: (w. sticky rice). a great thai style marinated beef steak grilled to perfect your taste served with mango salad and sticky rice.

items.name: Chicken Turmeric With Peanut Sauce
items.description: grilled marinated thai style chicken breast with turmeric, lemongrass and thai herbs served with curry rice, peanut sauce and cucumber sauce.

items.name: Grilled Pork Chop (2)
items.description: thai style smoky grilled marinated pork chops served with steamed vegetable served with soy or hot dipping sauce.

items.name: Seafood Black Pepper
items.description: (best seafood dish). a full of flavors of new zealand mussels, shrimps and squid sauteed with lime leaves, green peppercorn, garlic and chili pepper in heavy crushed black pepper and thai spices.

items.name: New New York Strip Steak Thai Style
items.description: the best selected, new york strip steak grilled, served with thai roasted pepper sauce, and steamed vegetable.

items.name: New Salmon Steak
items.description: grilled salmon with basil sauce or green corry sauce.

items.name: Soft Shell Crab
items.description: with basil sauce or garlic sauce.

items.name: Mussels Pancake
items.description: (dine only). Pan fried mussels with eggs, scalion and bean speut most popular of thai foods.

items.name: Grilled Japanese Eel
items.description: served w. coconut rice.

items.name: Yajai Trio
items.description: (new and sexy) shrimps, squid and chicken sauteed with basil, zuccini, babycorn in karee curry sauce and a touch of thai spices. who doesnÂ’t like threesome!!!

categories.name: Mok Duck
categories.description: Served with jasmine rice: smoked vegetarian duck (yes! It look like a duck, but itÂ’s not duck).

items.name: Sauteed Buddha Delight
items.description: (the holy duck). with mix vegetable and glass noodle, so healthy so well flavored.

items.name: Sauteed Basil
items.description: thai famous spicy sauce with mushroom, sweet pepper, onion and lime leavers.

items.name: Sauteed Chili Paste
items.description: (you got to love this dish). sweet chili sauce with onion, mushroom, carrot and string bean.

categories.name: Duck
categories.description: Served with jasmine rice, our boneless young Long Island duck roasted to perfection served with your choice of our famous sauces.

items.name: Basil Sauce
items.description: (best sauce). thai famous spicy sauce with chili pepper, onion, kafir lime leaves and sweet chili paste.

items.name: Chili & Tamarind Sauce
items.description: sweet and sour tamarind sauce with shallots, garlic and ground fresh chili.

items.name: Ginger Honey Sauce
items.description: freshly and spicy from fresh ginger, sweet pepper, black mushroom, carrot and black bean sauce.

items.name: Curry Sauce
items.description: thai red curry sauce with green pea & carrot, pineapple, tomato, chili pepper and fresh basil leaves.

items.name: Garlic Sauce
items.description: heavy garlic and black pepper with mushroom and pea & carrot served with cucumber.

items.name: Pad Thai
items.description: (a must have). the most popular stir-fried rice noodle dish with egg, bean curd, ground peanut, sweet radish, bean sprout and scallion.

items.name: Glass Noodle
items.description: with egg, napa, black mushroom, scallion, onion and bean sprout.

items.name: Pad Se-Ew
items.description: stir-fried flat noodle with broccoli and egg in dark soy bean sauce.

items.name: Singapore Noodle
items.description: (still really good). thai curry seasoning stir-fried flat noodle with egg, mushroom, carrot, sweet pepper, basil leaves and roasted chili pepper.

items.name: Spicy Noodle
items.description: (best noodle dish). stir-fried flat noodle with mushroom, carrot, sweet pepper, onion, basil leaves and roasted chili pepper in dark soy sauce and thai spices.

items.name: Pad Mee
items.description: stir-fried thin angel hair noodle with egg, mushroom, onion, sweet pepper and scallion with tomato sauce and thai spices.

categories.name: Big Bowl Noodle Soup
categories.description: Choice of rice noodle or flat noodle.

items.name: Bangkok Noodle Soup
items.description: simple clear chicken broth with bean sprout, scallion and cilantro.

items.name: Spicy Noodle Soup
items.description: (spicy and sour will hit the spot!). spicy and sour broth from thai spices and lime juice with bean sprout, roasted chili pepper, Grounded peanut, scallion and cilantro.

items.name: Beef Or Shrimp Or Squid
items.description: new thai sausage.

items.name: Thai Fried Rice
items.description: simplest fried rice with egg, pea & carrot, onion and tomato.

items.name: Â“Drunk ArdÂ” Fried Rice
items.description: with sweet pepper, onion, roasted chili pepper mushroom and basil leaves.

items.name: Pineapple Fried Rice
items.description: (the best with thai sausage!). with nice flavor of cashew, pea & carrot, egg, onion and tomato.

items.name: Curry Fried Rice
items.description: with pea & carrot, onion, babycorn, sweet pepper and a touch of coconut milk.

items.name: Yajai Fried Rice
items.description: (ginger fried rice). ginger shreded in fried rice with egg, pea, carrot, onion & black mushroom.

items.name: Custard
items.description: slice of heavenly cold custard in a cup.

items.name: Mango And Coconut Sticky Rice
items.description: sweet mango with sweet sticky rice (seasonal only).

items.name: Fried Banana Crepes
items.description: topped with pure honey and roasted sesame seeds.

items.name: Fried Ice Cream
items.description: hot and crunchy bread from outside and cold vanilla from inside, topping with whipped cream and colorful topping (for in-house only).

items.name: Lychee Or Longan And Coconut Sticky Rice
items.description: surprise yourself by asking us what is todayÂ’s house dessert is!!! enjoy.

items.name: Ice-Cream
items.description: (vanilla and green tea).

items.name: Thai Iced Tea
items.description: thai iced coffee.

items.name: Grilled Pork Chop Over Rice
items.description: thai style smoky grilled marinated pork chops (1) served with steamed vegetables served with soy sauce and spicy sauce.

items.name: Yajai Grilled Chicken Over Rice
items.description: experience our thai style marinated chicken with herbs, garlic and seasoned so well that would leave you coming for more, served with sweet chili sauce.
